changes.description: Non-compete reduced from 12 to 6 months, radius reduced from 50 to 25 miles, added exception for termination without cause
Vacation increased from 13 to 18 days, added carryover policy, reduced insurance waiting period
Notice period extended from 30 to 60 days and added severance policy
Salary increased from $120,000 to $138,000 and added 15% performance bonus
